mapper.select: SELECT id, puid, wallet_address, total_due, total_paid, pay_model, pplns_rate, ppsplus_rate, ppsplus_group, fpps_rate, fpps_group, is_pay_enable, last_pay_at, min_pay, currency_id, update_time FROM user_pay up WHERE up.total_due >= min_pay AND is_pay_enable = 1 AND currency_id = #{currencyId} AND wallet_address IS NOT NULL AND IFNULL(hour(TIMEDIFF(update_time,now())),73) > 72
SELECT * FROM `user_pay` where puid = #{puid} AND currency_id = #{currencyId}

SELECT puid, total_due, total_paid FROM user_pay WHERE puid IN #{item}
AND currency_id = #{currencyId}
